title: Raeven Blacklock
description: Take a peek into the life of Raeven Blacklock from 'The Fire Mage Trilogy' in this never-before-seen prequel to 'Frost Arch'. All new content and information about Raeven.Voted most-popular character of the trilogy by readers. Entire story available FREE through: Goodreads, Smashwords, Scribd, and Kate's personal blog, as a gift to my readers.***Recommended reading BEFORE this short story: Frost Arch - Book 1 of The Fire Mage Trilogy***
author: Kate Bloomfield
